Definitions: The party responsible for managing the community solar garden, ensuring its operation, and maintaining subscriber relations.
The individual or entity subscribing to the community solar garden to receive solar energy credits.
The duration of the agreement during which the Provider manages the community solar garden and the Customer subscribes to it.
The monetary penalty imposed on the Provider for each kilowatt-hour of energy not delivered as agreed.
The percentage of energy production that the Provider guarantees to the Customer, ensuring a minimum level of service.

Details the process and guidelines for transferring payments from subscribers to the management entity; includes information on payment methods, frequency, and any related financial handling procedures as outlined in the Subscriber Management Agreement
The conditions under which either party can terminate the agreement before the end of the Term, including any penalties or requirements for notice.
